item.title: A 1-year-old was among 159 killed in Hong Kong apartment fires. 30 others missing
item.description: The death toll from a high-rise apartment fire in Hong Kong has risen to 159

item.title: Trump admin updates: Hegseth says he did not see 2nd boat strike, survivors
item.description: Hegseth said he saw the first attack, but didn't "stick around" for the second.
